name: Gambler Jail
description:
Wanted to make a bigger game but forgot I had to make it in 2 days, so I have a quarter baked game. I'm still happy with it tho, it was my first Godot game and the graphics look neat imo. 

///CONTROLS///

WASD-Movement

///DICE///

E-Interact, throw dice

Every thime the hand's movement changes, the dice's number goes up by one. 

///SLOTS///

Space- Bet 1 coin on slots

Tab- bet 10 coins on slots

E- Pring up the slot sheet where you can see how much coins each combination gives
